Audio.Locality: Reserva Ecológica de Guapi Açu (REGUA), RJ
Audio.Author: Eric DeFonso
Audio.Comments: Natural song (rapid hollow trill) from a bird about 10-15m away, filtered below 100Hz and signal amplified about 10dB. Recorded from the Green Trailthat heads into the higher hills of the reserve, in a bamboo section by the roadside.bird-seen:noplayback-used:no
